name: Crematorium
description: The Crematorium is the official facility in Cassandra responsible for the final disposal of bodies. It is normally inaccessible to the public and becomes relevant due to suspicious hospital records regarding the rapid transfer of THE SECOND CASE VICTIM's body.

snapshot.name: Crematorium
snapshot.description: According to hospital archives, Lucifero's body (THE SECOND CASE VICTIM, 21-year-old, December 22, 2003) was transferred here shortly before investigators arrived at the hospital. The facility represents the final documented destination of the SECOND CASE corpse, but what actually occurred inside remains unclear. IMPORTANT: The FIRST CASE victim (19-year-old girl, frozen in ice, December 22, 2002) was NEVER brought here—her body was found in the hotel freezer and handled differently.
